forumNotes.author: tieukhongminh_cn
forumNotes.content:
I want to creat USB Kaspersky Rescue but it was broken.  
Code menu.lst  
title Kaspersky Rescue CD iso (Virus Scanner)  
find --ignore-floppies --set-root /rescue/rescue.iso  
map /rescue/rescue.iso (0xff)  
map --hook  
root (0xff)  
chainloader (0xff)  
And picture wrong [https://photos.googl...nBjjs7QbX70Cr1_](https://photos.google.com/search/_tra_/photo/AF1QipP1EqytW08aFoC-gwcn16K0EnBjjs7QbX70Cr1_ "External link")  
... Please help me make USB Kaspersky Rescue. Thank you.

forumNotes.author: Wonko the Sane
forumNotes.content:
THe Kaspersky rescue.iso is a known troublemaker you need a moresophisticated approach.

See:

[http://reboot.pro/to...e-6#entry150776](http://reboot.pro/topic/5041-post-here-anything-that-crosses-your-mind-about-grub4dos/page-6#entry150776 "")

More ways:

[http://www.rmprepusb.../kasperkyrescue](http://www.rmprepusb.com/tutorials/kasperkyrescue "External link")

![:duff:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/duff.gif)

Wonko
